title: Operation Pridefall, Groomers, and Kink at Pride: Part 1
itunes:title: Operation Pridefall, Groomers, and Kink at Pride: Part 1
description:
We discuss the influx of “grooming” accusations levied against queer people in recent months alongside “kink at pride” discourse.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
